content: It's good to see you, <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>.

content: {A挠头}Ahem. My apologies for getting carried away. In any case, each planet has its own marvels, and I hope you find undiscovered wonders during your stay here.

content: I'm studying the taxonomic differences between common shrub-dwelling mantis species and their counterparts on <style=PlayerName>{主星名}</style> that have evolved unique morphological features based on floral patterns.
